content:
Here are some more punny team names inspired by current NBA players:

1. "Ja-mazing!" (inspired by Ja Morant)
2. "The McCollum and Get It" (inspired by CJ McCollum and the saying "come and get it")
3. "Sabonis, My Dear Watson" (inspired by Domantas Sabonis and the classic Sherlock Holmes catchphrase)
4. "The Klay Thompson Twins" (inspired by Klay Thompson and the term "twins")
5. "The Porzingis Experience" (inspired by Kristaps Porzingis and the term "the human experience")
6. "The Draymond Green Machines" (inspired by Draymond Green and the idea of a "green machine")
7. "The Herroes" (inspired by Tyler Herro and the word "heroes")
8. "The Simmons Says" (inspired by Ben Simmons and the classic game "Simon Says")

I hope you find these punny team names funny and inspiring!
